publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4311 Colin Fox: Bathgate Thistleâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Bathgate Thistle on reaching the final of the OVD Scottish Junior Cup; recognises that their nail-biting semi-final victory, after extra time, over Irvine Meadow means that they have reached the final for the first time in their history, and wishes all supporters an enjoyable day out when they play Auchinleck Talbot at Rugby Park in Kilmarnock on 21 May 2006.
S2M-4311 Bathgate Thistle (lodged on 28 April 2006) Mrs Mary Mulligan*
